entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow and blowing snow. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:40 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 late this evening then light before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:40 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
